title: Recipe Finder
description: This is a recipe finder app, that me and my team mates created for a project.

title: Password Generator
description: This is a password generator using javascript to create a 10 to 64 character long password based on user input. The password can use upper, lower, numeric and special characters. The script uses functions, and prints the password to the page. No need to open dev window, as the console does not log the interactions.

title: Console Finances
description: The mywork.js file contains some finance code for the finances array in index.js These can be see at work in the console.
